text: Richard 'Ricky' Skerritt (born 7 June 1956) is a Saint Kitts and Nevis politician affiliated to the St Kitts and Nevis Labour Party. He held several portfolios in the country's ministry from 2004 to 2015. He has also been closely associated with cricket in the Caribbean and has acted as the manager of West Indies cricket team. In March 2019, he was elected as the President of Cricket West Indies, along with his running mate, Dr. Kishore Shallow as Vice President when they defeated the incumbents president Dave Cameron and vice president Emmanuel Nanthan by margins of 8–4 in a secret ballot. == Personal life == Skerritt was born on 7 June 1956 in Saint Kitts. He has a bachelor's degree from the University of the Virgin Islands and a master's degree from Oxford University. == References == == External links == *Official Website of Cricket West Indies Category:Cricket administration in the West Indies Category:1968 births Category:Living people Category:Alumni of the University of Oxford Category:University of the Virgin Islands alumni Category:Saint Lucian politicians
title: Ricky Skerritt
